An essay towards the recovery of the Jewish measures & weights, comprehending their monies, by help of ancient standards, compared with ours of England useful also to state many of those of the Greeks and Romans, and the eastern nations / by Richard Cumberland ... Cumberland, Richard, 1631-1718.
[18], 140, [4] p. : ill.
Printed by Richard Chiswell ..., London : 1686.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. "Books printed for, and sold by Richard Chiswell" at end. Diagram: p. [17], [18] "A table of the principal measures, &c. herein contained": p. 135-139.
